text: Teaching kids to count is fine, but teaching them what counts is best.
author: Bob Talbert

text: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: Nine-tenths of education is encouragement.
author: Anatole France

text: Teachers have three loves: love of learning, love of learners, and the love of bringing the first two loves together.
author: Scott Hayden

text: Education is our passport to the future, for tomorrow belongs to the people who prepare for it today.
author: Malcolm X

text: I am not a teacher, but an awakener.
author: Robert Frost

text: The art of teaching is the art of assisting discovery.
author: Mark Van Doren

text: To teach is to learn twice over.
author: Joseph Joubert

text: A teacher affects eternity; he can never tell where his influence stops.
author: Henry B. Adams

text: Education is not the filling of a pail, but the lighting of a fire.
author: William Butler Yates

text: They may forget what you said but they will not forget how you made them feel.
author: Carl Buechner

text: All students can learn and succeed, but not in the same way and not in the same day.
author: William G. Spady

text: I like a teacher who gives you something to take home to think about besides homework.
author: Lily Tomlin

text: Technology is just a tool. In terms of getting the kids to work together and motivating them, the teacher is the most important.
author: Bill Gates

text: It’s the teacher that makes the difference, not the classroom.
author: Michael Morpurgo

text: Good teaching is one-fourth preparation and three-fourths theatre.
author: Gail Goldwin

text: Everyone who remembers his own education remembers teachers, not methods and techniques. The teacher is the heart of the educational system.
author: Sidney Hook

text: The task of the modern educator is not to cut down jungles, but to irrigate deserts.
author: C. S. Lewis

text: I touch the future. I teach.
author: Christa McAuliffe

text: I am a teacher born and bred, and I believe in the advocacy of teachers. It’s a calling. We want our students to feel impassioned and empowered.
author: Erin Gruwell

text: Teachers believe they have a gift for giving; it drives them with the same irrepressible drive that drives others to create a work of art or a market or a building.
author: A. Bartlett Giamatti

text: If you have to put someone on a pedestal, put teachers. They are society’s heroes.
author: Guy Kawasaki

text: The duties of a teacher are neither few nor small, but they elevate the mind and give energy to the character.
author: Dorothea Dix

text: To this end, the greatest asset of a school is the personality of the teacher.
author: John Strachan

text: The whole purpose of education is to turn mirrors into windows.
author: Sydney J. Harris

text: In education, technology can be a life-changer, a game changer, for kids who are both in school and out of school.
author: Queen Rania of Jordan

text: What sculpture is to a block of marble, education is to a human soul.
author: Joseph Addison

text: Education breeds confidence. Confidence breeds hope. Hope breeds peace.
author: Confucius

text: Better than a thousand days of diligent study is one day with a great teacher.
author: Japanese Proverb

text: Teachers can change lives with just the right mix of chalk and challenges.
author: Joyce Meyer
